text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 85.1. Burjoon waly asman ki qasam! 85.2. Wada kiey hoy din ki qasam! 85.3. Hazir honey waly aur hazir kiey hoy ki qasam 85.4. (kay) kahndaqon waly halak kiey gay
